name: Turbo Turtle & Space Duck Shooter
description:
How to play:

Keyboard: WASD or Arrows to move, Space to shoot;

Controller: Left Stick or Arrows to move, Right Buttons to shoot.

This game have partial controller compatibility. You can play with a controller, but you'll need a mouse on the menu scenes.

This game is based in the old Top-Down Space Shooters, Star Wars, Toy Story, and tends to make people playing nonstop. Hope you all like it.
